response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
MEMORANDUM

TO: [Client Name]
FROM: [Your Name], Senior Paralegal
DATE: [Current Date]
RE: Document Preparation and Filing System Organization

I. Affidavit Preparation
   A. Drafted affidavit for [Witness Name] regarding [Subject Matter]
   B. Reviewed and revised affidavit for [Expert Witness Name]
   C. Notarized and filed affidavit for [Client Name] with the court

II. Legal Correspondence
   A. Prepared demand letter to [Opposing Party]
   B. Drafted response to discovery requests
   C. Composed settlement offer letter for attorney review

III. Document Organization
   A. Electronic Filing System
      1. Updated case management software with new documents
      2. Created new folders for recent depositions and expert reports
      3. Implemented consistent naming convention for all digital files
   B. Paper Filing System
      1. Organized physical documents by date and category
      2. Created new labeled folders for recent case developments
      3. Updated master index of all paper documents

IV. Next Steps
   A. Schedule follow-up meeting to review prepared documents
   B. Conduct final quality check on filing system organization
   C. Brief team on new document management protocols

Please review the above actions and let me know if you require any additional information or have any questions regarding the document preparation or filing system organization.
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
